Node.definition: to lift up (one's eye, face); hence: = action by which humans direct their face or eyes away from the ground so that they can see what is in the distance or in the sky

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= causative action by which humans divide an object or a set of objects into two or more parts

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

= woman; ◄ daughter of Laban (לָבָן) ► first wife of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) mother of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן) Levi (לֵוִי) Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) Judah (יְהוּדָה) Issachar (יִשָּׂשכָר) Zebulun (זְבוּלוּן) Dinah (דִּינָה) and, through her slave Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) of Gad (גָּד) and Asher (אָשֵׁר)

= woman; ◄ daughter of Laban (לָבָן) ► second and favorite wife of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) mother of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) and Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) and, through her slave girl Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) of Dan (דָּן) and Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= woman; ◄ daughter of Laban (לָבָן) ► first wife of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) mother of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן) Levi (לֵוִי) Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) Judah (יְהוּדָה) Issachar (יִשָּׂשכָר) Zebulun (זְבוּלוּן) Dinah (דִּינָה) and, through her slave Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) of Gad (גָּד) and Asher (אָשֵׁר)
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= pertaining to being located behind other objects in a row

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= woman; ◄ daughter of Laban (לָבָן) ► second and favorite wife of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) mother of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) and Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) and, through her slave girl Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) of Dan (דָּן) and Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= pertaining to being located behind other objects in a row
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to draw near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= action by which humans put their arms around someone else ► as a greeting, a sign of affection, or during love making
literally: to fall on (someone's) neck; hence: = action by which humans spontaneously embrace other humans
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
to lift up (one's eye, face); hence: = action by which humans direct their face or eyes away from the ground so that they can see what is in the distance or in the sky

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities give something to (other) humans out of the kind disposition of their hearts
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

Node.definition: = action by which humans move to a location closer to a point of reference

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= woman; ◄ daughter of Laban (לָבָן) ► first wife of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) mother of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן) Levi (לֵוִי) Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) Judah (יְהוּדָה) Issachar (יִשָּׂשכָר) Zebulun (זְבוּלוּן) Dinah (דִּינָה) and, through her slave Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) of Gad (גָּד) and Asher (אָשֵׁר)

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
literally: a camp; hence: = a relatively large group of people, such as nomads or soldiers, moving from one camping place to another
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
literally: (someone's) hand; hence: = state in which humans own a particular object

Node.gloss: to see (someone's) face > to be in (someone's) presence
Node.definition: literally: to see (someone's) face; hence: = state in which humans are in the close presence of someone of a higher social status, such as a ruler, or even God himself

Node.gloss: to see (someone's) face > to be in (someone's) presence
Node.definition: literally: to see (someone's) face; hence: = state in which humans are in the close presence of someone of a higher social status, such as a ruler, or even God himself
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= objects, ◄ presented as gift by one person to another
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

Node.gloss: to be driven hard|to be overdriven
Node.definition: = state in which people or animals are forced to exert more strength than they can handle

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans and their domestic animals journey from one place to the other
= pertaining to being performed at a slow pace, without intensity
literally: foot; hence: = the ability of humans and animals to walk fast and/or far, depending on size and age
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: foot; hence: = the ability of humans and animals to walk fast and/or far, depending on size and age
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= mountainous area east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) valley and south of Moab (מֹואָב) first inhabited by the Horites (חֹרִי) and later by the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
= causative action by which humans place other humans or objects in a certain location
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to find favor; hence: = state in which humans find the approval of deities or (other) humans
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
= mountainous area east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) valley and south of Moab (מֹואָב) first inhabited by the Horites (חֹרִי) and later by the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד)
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד)

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) as a town of refuge
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)

m.definition: = land, also known as Aram Naharaim (אֲרַם נַהֲרַיִם) ◄ located in upper Mesopotamia, around the great bend of the Euphrates (פְּרָת) River in northern Syria; ► ancestral home of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) family

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.gloss: to acquire|to obtain|to purchase|to buy|to reclaim
Node.definition: = action by which humans acquire an animate or inanimate object ◄ by means of a financial transaction or in another way

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= object that is owned by someone; ◄ usually with the underlying assumption that it has been shared out to that person (or his ancestors) in the past

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to stretch out (one's) tent; hence: = causative action by which humans erect their tent by stretching out the tent curtains over a structure of poles
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
literally: (someone's) hand; hence: = state in which humans own a particular object
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Shechem (שְׁכֶם)
= a person ► who is the founder of a village, town, or region, and usually the ancestor of most of its inhabitants
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) as a town of refuge
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= weight of unknown value; ► used as coinage

Node.gloss: to cause to stand|to set (up)|to put|to place
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause a person, animal or inanimate object to be in a certain location, usually in an upright position
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon

Node.gloss: El elohe yisrael|God, the God of Israel
Node.definition: = name of altar, ► erected by Jacob (יַעֲקֹב)
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
